description: Israel has declared Iran’s Central Bank a terrorist organisation, accused it of being a conduit for terrorism. description:

title: Iran-Israel War: US urges China to stop Iran from shutting Strait of Hormuz - 'economic suicide for them'
description:

title: 'Economic suicide': US on possible Strait of Hormuz closure by Iran
description: US Secretary of State Marco Rubio on Sunday reacted to reports claiming that the Iranian parliament has approved a measure to close the Strait of Hormuz, saying that it would be an “economic suicide”.
